alert.note: Alert for Bay; Huron; Midland; Saginaw; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 12:19PM EST until February 03 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Midland, Bay, Huron, Saginaw and Tuscola Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Wednesday to midnight EST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain is expected to change over to snow during the early morning hours on Wednesday, with snow then increasing in coverage. Prolonged snowfall will then persist through the remainder of the day, before tapering off late Wednesday night into early Thursday morning. Snowfall rates on the order of a half inch to three quarters of an inch are expected. Gusty winds from the north also may contribute to blowing snow and reductions to visibilities starting Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
